meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he shat in the park.
meanings.sent2: The dog shat on the carpet.
meanings.sent3: The bird shat on my head, what a surprise!
meanings.sent4: His lies shat doubt on his credibility.
meanings.sent5: The volcano shat molten lava into the sky.

meanings.sent1: She found a shat diaper in the trash.
meanings.sent2: The alley was filled with shat garbage.
meanings.sent3: The prankster left a shat pie on the doorstep.
meanings.sent4: The river carried shat debris downstream.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered in shat manure for fertilization.
